attributes.action: Bring compulsory mediation into law for fathers and mothers in the event of relationship breakdown.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Relationship breakdown, be it marriage or any other form of relationship is difficult, especially when children are involved. 

In these cases it is almost impossible for parents to make dispassionate and sensible decisions with respect to their children. It is often more important to the individuals involved in the relationship breakdown to hurt each other, rather than resolve issues.

Children and their access are effectively used as weapons to hurt the other party.

We need a compulsory structure in place where ex. partners are encouraged, in a positive environment, to make proper provisions for care both financially and emotionally of their children.

Please join me then, by signing this petition to make mediation compulsory in the event of relationship breakdown where children are involved.
